ai-anya-e0101n11:54_1: And although they are able to discern them back and forth by the hand of knowledge, they should advert to them, give attention to them as mere elements, and bring them to mind as the earth element. ai-anya-e0101n11:56_3: and he does his defining thus, “In four parts what matures is the fire element,”
ai-anya-e0101n11:56_4: in the six components the mode of the wind element, thus the air element,

ai-anya-e0101n11:57_1: However, if he still does not succeed with his meditation subject when he gives his meditation subject to the meditation subject when he is developing it with this meditation subject, how should it be developed?
ai-anya-e0101n11:57_2: Firstly, the bhikkhu should carry out all the directions given for the thirty-two-fold aspect in the description of mindfulness occupied with the body as a meditation subject .
ai-anya-e0101n11:57_3: and he should start with the verbal recitation, in direct and reverse order, of the skin pentad and so on, without omitting any of it.
ai-anya-e0101n11:57_4: The only difference is this: there, after giving attention to the head hairs, etc., as to colour, shape, direction, location, and delimitation, the mind had to be fixed by means of repulsiveness , but here it is done by means of elements.
